page.title: 17Milton Keynes Bowl,page 2
page.content: I went to a concert at the Milton Keynes Bowl.It can hold 50,000 people sitting on the slopes watching the events which take place in the middle of the flat area.There was a big screen where you could see the singers face. Thousands of people were inside but outside there were 100's of people watching the screen from nearby hillsides.You could hear the music all over Bletchley. Policemen had to be drafted in from all the surrounding areas to police the traffic and the parking.Special police have to mingle with the crowds inside the Bowl so do members of the drug squad.It costs a lot of money to pay for this and the policemen also have to be fed all day.
